fields.headline: Best offers
fields.bodyText: Under £300 London: Until the end of March, Superbreak (01904 644455, superbreak.com) is offering one night's B&B at the four-star De Vere Cavendish St James in Mayfair for £69pp (two sharing), saving £25. France: Until April 10, Crystal France (0870 8880233, crystalfrance.co.uk) has two nights' B&B at the Hotel Red Fox in Le Touquet for £120pp including Dover-Calais sea crossing. Italy: Departing March 7, Travelscene Ireland All Over (0151-231 1480) is offering three nights' B&B for the price of two at the Jury's Inn in Limerick. £210pp (two sharing) including Heathrow flights to Shannon. France: For departures until the end of March, VFB (01242 240310, vfbholidays.co.uk) has four nights' B&B at the art-deco four-star Hotel Lutétia in Paris for £299pp (two sharing) including Eurostar travel and insurance. Norway: Until May 19, Taber Holidays (01274 594 642, taberhols.co.uk) has three nights' B&B at the three-star Augustin Hotel in Bergen for £299 (saving £48) including scheduled flights from Gatwick. Under £500 Europe: Kirker Holidays (020-7231 3333, kirkerholidays.com) has extended its 'three nights for the price of two' special offer for departures until March 28. Three nights' B&B at the four-star Trocadero Dokhan's in Paris costs £340pp (two sharing) including Eurostar travel. Similar deals are available in Brussels, Monte Carlo, Amsterdam, Venice, Rome, Florence, Barcelona, Madrid, Prague, Dublin and Carcassone. Italy: For April 12 and 26 departures, Citalia (020-8686 5533, citalia.com) has seven nights' self-catering at Il Borgo di Montereggi in Tuscany from £359pp (two sharing), saving up to £226pp, including Gatwick flights and car hire. Italy: On the weekend of March 28-30, the Palazzo Arzaga (0039 030 680600, palazzoarzaga.com) on Lake Garda has a stress-busting and anti-ageing Qi Gong weekend from £465pp including two nights' full-board and seminar. Ryanair (0870 1569569, ryanair.com) has direct Stansted-Brescia flights from £95 return. India: Departing March 20, seven nights at Prainha Cottages in Goa costs £485pp (saving £200) including Gatwick flights. Cheapestflights (0871 7501788, cheapestflights.co.uk). Thailand: Book by March 31 for departures from May 1- June 15 and Travelbag (0870 8901460, travelbag.co.uk) is offering 14 nights' room-only for the price of seven at the Regent Cha Am resort. £495pp including Qantas flights from Heathrow to Bangkok. Sardinia: Departing April 12 and 26, Sardatur Holidays (020-7242 2455, sardinia-holidays.co.uk) has seven nights' half-board at the four-star Colonna Park Hotel on Costa Smeralda for £498pp (saving £127) including return flights and transfers. Under £1,000 Cruise: Departing April 24, Voyages of Discovery (01444 462150, voyagesofdiscovery.com) has a 10-night cruise visiting Egypt, Greece, Croatia and Albania from £499pp (two sharing), saving £560, including Gatwick flights, transfers, taxes, full board with wine at dinner, entertainment and one night's half-board in Kefallonia. Malaysia: Until the end of March, Magic of the Orient (01293 537700, magic-of-the-orient.com) is offering seven nights' B&B at the five-star Rasa Sayang Hotel in Penang for £598pp (saving £430), including scheduled flights and private transfers. Grenada: Until the end of March, Thomas Cook Signature (0870 4434441, tcsignature.com) has seven nights' room-only at the three-star Rex Grenadian from £599pp (saving £286), including Tuesday BA scheduled flights from Gatwick and transfers. Greece: Sunvil Greece (020-8568 4499, sunvil.co.uk) has an escorted archaeological tour departing May 18. Based in Tolon for six nights (half-board) and Athens for one night (B&B), the tour visits Assini, Epidavros, Tyrins, Sparta, Mystra, Corinth and Mycenae. £946pp (two sharing), including flights and transfers. Over £1,000 Nevis: Between March 8 and April 2, Caribbean Expressions (020-7431 2131, expressionsholidays.co.uk) is offering seven nights' B&B for the price of five at the Montpelier Plantation Inn. From £1,401pp (two sharing), including British Airways and Liat flights and private taxi transfers. Mauritius: During March, Gateway Holidays (0871 2228379, gatewayholidays.co.uk) has 12 nights' half-board at the five-star Le Paradise Cove Hotel for £1,499pp (saving £300), including Heathrow flights, transfers, accommodation, watersports, a catamaran cruise and a spa treatment. Maldives: Until April 27, spa specialist Essential Escapes (020-7284 3344, essentialescapes.com) is offering seven nights' B&B for the price of six at Soneva Fushi. £1,735pp (two sharing), including Emirates flights and seaplane transfers. Seychelles: In May and June, Barefoot Luxury (020-8741 4319, barefootluxury.com) has seven nights' full-board at the new North Island Lodge from £6,880pp (saving £1,030), including BA first-class flights and helicopter transfers.
